title: Nez Perce National Historical Park: Public Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Public Transportation              Public Transportation      Public transportation is not available. Rental car agencies are available at various points around the park - Lewiston and Clarkston, Idaho; Spokane, Washington; and Butte Montana. There are also various tour companies that provide tour-based transportation, but none of the sites are part of a regional public transportation network.
